description:
My place is conveniently located 2 blocks away from the 3 & 4 train at Utica ave.  It is 2 blocks away from Lincoln Terrace park which is a quaint neighborhood park that has a play area for kids.  We are 1 express stop away from the Brooklyn Museum and Botanical Gardens.  This is a perfect location for quick access to the city, only 20-30 minutes away from 14th street Union Square.. You'll love my place because it is a private getaway in the heart of bklyn. My place is good for all people.

This is a 1 bedroom that offers separate beds for traveling friends or acquaintances. It can comfortably fit 3-4 people.l

Pleas feel free to help yourself to anything you may need in my home . There are additional bedding and pillows + towels in the bedroom closet.  Bedding for the following out couch is located here.

I am available on a needed basis.

I am conveniently located 3 blocks from the 3 and 4 train.

The space can get pretty warm with the location heating. Feel free to leave a window open.  The toilet is fully functional but makes noise. Close the bathroom door and you won't hear it.
name: Cozy 1 Bedroom in Crown Heights, near a park
